Have you ever sent a letter to your senator? What about your state legislators or even the mayor of your town? Their contact information is scattered throughout the web on various official and unofficial websites. With this website, it should make it easy to quickly find the person you wish to contact.

Enter your zipcode:

  • LOCAL
  • STATE
  • FEDERAL

MITCHELL ENGLANDER

Mitchell Englander is a member of the Los Angeles City Council, representing District 12 in the San Fernando Valley. He is the only member of the city council who is registered as Republican.

City Hall Office: 200 N. Spring St., Room 405 | Los Angeles, CA 90012 | Phone: (213) 473-7012 - Fax: (213) 473-6925
Community Service Center: 9207 Oakdale Ave., Suite 200 | Chatsworth, CA 91311 | Phone: (818) 882-1212 - Fax: (818) 701-5254

             

ERIC GARCETTI

Eric Michael Garcetti (born February 4, 1971) is the current mayor of Los Angeles. A member of the Democratic Party, he was first elected mayor in 2013, and won reelection in the 2017 election.

Mailing Address: 777 S. Figueroa St., Ste. 4050 Los Angeles CA 90017

             

JERRY BROWN

Edmund Gerald "Jerry" Brown Jr. is an American politician and lawyer who has served as the 39th Governor of California since 2011. A member of the Democratic Party, Brown previously served as the 34th governor from 1975 to 1983, and is the longest-serving governor in California history.

Mailing Address: c/o State Capitol, Suite 1173 Sacramento, CA 95814 | Phone: (916) 445-2841 | Fax: (916) 558-3160

             

DIANNE FEINSTEIN

Dianne Goldman Berman Feinstein is the senior United States Senator from California. A member of the Democratic Party, she has served in the Senate since 1992.

Washington D.C. Office: 331 Hart Senate Office Building Washington, D.C. 20510 | Phone: (202) 224-3841 | Fax: (202) 228-3954 | TTY/TDD: (202) 224-2501

             

KAMALA HARRIS

Kamala Devi Harris is an American attorney and politician who is the junior United States Senator from California. She is a member of the Democratic Party and served as the 32nd Attorney General of California.

Capital Office Washington D.C.: 112 Hart Senate Office Building Washington, DC 20510 | Phone (202) 224-3553 | Fax (202) 224-2200
Capital Office Sacramento: 501 I Street Suite 7-600 Sacramento, CA 95814 | Phone (916) 448 - 2787 | Fax (202) 228 - 3865
State Office Fresno: 2500 Tulare Street Suite 5290 Fresno, CA 93721 | Phone (559) 497 - 5109 | Fax (202) 228 - 3864
State Office Los Angeles: 312 N. Spring St. Suite 1748 Los Angeles, CA 90012 | Phone (213) 894 - 5000 | Fax (202) 224 - 0357
State Office San Francisco: 50 United Nations Plaza Suite 5584 San Francisco, CA 94102 | Phone (415) 355 - 9041 | Fax (202) 224 - 0454
State Office San Diego: 600 B Street Suite 2240 San Diego, CA 92101 | Phone (619) 239 - 3884 | Fax (202) 228 - 3863

             

DONALD TRUMP

Donald John Trump is an American businessman, television personality, politician, and the 45th President of the United States. His political positions have been described by scholars and commentators as populist, protectionist, and nationalist.
